song_name: If Everything Within These Walls Were One House
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, If Everything Within These Walls Were One House is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
If Everything Within These Walls Were One House is written in the key of C Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 3rd most popular key among Minor keys and     the 9th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (C minor, F minor, and G minor).

See the C Minor Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
